'Agricultural Development Authority Palm' A-D-A Palm
AdaPalm bụ aha ịchafụ nke ezigbo aha ya bụ 'Agricultural Development Authority Palm'.
Ọ bụ ogige buru nnukwu ibu ebe a na-emepụta mmanụ nri.
Osikapa dịzị ka 'visa' na Naijirịa mana lee ka Coscharis si emepụta nke ya
Ị ma Erisco? Lee ka N4200 si mụtara ya ụlọ mmepụta tomato kachasị n'Afrịka
Ọgba mbọ: Etu m si bido ịgba mbọ
Etu m si hapụ ọrụ ụlọakụ wee tụtụwa plastiki7cf6c31a-cd39-4e19-8116-d278f0861bee.jpg
Osisi nkwụ a kụrụ n'ogige a karịrị puku narị isii na iri anọ na ụma.
Ọ bụrụ na ogige a na-arụ ọrụ etu o kwesịrị, ndịọrụ ya ga-eru ihe karịrị mmadụ puku iri abụọ.
Mana kedu etu ọnọdụ AdaPalm dị ugbua?
Lee ihe BBC Igbo chọpụtara oge anyị gara ebe ahụ.
Ndị mere akụkọ a bụ Ikechukwu Kalu, Nnamdi Agbanelo na Adline Okere.
